text: It's Raining interactions will no longer continue to occur after a Sim has seen the weather several times.
Werewolf, Vampire, and normal Sim skin types are now updating correctly at proper times.
Children will no longer levitate when they watch a birth.
Pets now receive their pension upon retirement.
[MAC ONLY] Swimming in a pool inside a high rise building will no longer cause a Sim’s plumbob to become invisible.
Sims will now much more rarely route through swimming pools when trying to reach locations.
Sims will now not run indoors.
Mermaid Children can now take showers.
Toddler's body no longer deforms when "Watching TV" after "Learning to Talk."
Neighbors will no longer gather to watch a burglar that hasn't yet stolen anything.
Only one Grim Reaper will appear on a lot where more than one death has occurred.
Grim Reaper relationship will only appear once in Relationship Panel if there is more than one death occurring on a lot.
Teens will no longer leave a Business lot with unpaid goods at the time of curfew.
Dorm Cooks will no longer duplicate on previously played lots after installing Nightlife.
Asking fifth person to join water wiggler no longer affects gameplay.
Sim animations will no longer break when the 'Offer Tattoo to…' interaction is used.
Torch sound effects are now being emitted from the proper position.
Birds and Womrats now require less feeding to survive.
Wish to "See Child Become a Genius" now auto cancels once it is no longer possible to fulfill.
Fixed a crash that occurred when moving through the installer very quickly.
Gnomes can now be live dragged on community lots.
The “Sniff” interaction can now be performed on Celebrity Sims when The Sims 3 Late Night is installed.
Snow angels now work properly.
The plumbbob will no longer appear in an NPCs chest when they marry into a Sim's family.
Karaoke Machine wishes will appear much less frequently.
Sims' lifespans are no longer altered when using the Change Appearance or Plan Outfit interactions.
Tourist NPCs can now be impregnated.
Fixed an issue where ghosts could become stuck in vehicles. Ghosts will now properly exit vehicles after arriving at their destination.
Sims will now correctly perform the Hula dance when asked to.
Send or receive a surprise gift box to and from your friends! It could contain anything from  Simoleons to a painting, or even a car!
Pets will no longer sink into the ground when Sims interact with Water Wiggler.
Addressed an issue where Sims could get stuck in the Sarcophagus if other Sims were lined up to use it.
Replaced a duplicate hat style for elder females.
The Grim Reaper will no longer be prevented from reaping souls due to band affiliation.
When in use, the shuffleboard will no longer lose its functionality when a Sim attempts to detonate the object.
New Pagoda style roofs.
Zits are now removed from any Sim that enters university.
Elder canes now work properly.
Sims can no longer hang out with Celebrity Sims on swing sets before properly impressing them.
Sims no longer get crushes from playing handhelds together.
When adopting a dog, you will now be shown whether the dog is a Little Dog or a Large Dog.
Pets will no longer visit Downtown alone.
Ghosts can now float into rooms with no doors.
Sims that catch on fire from the Invention Workstation can now have the fire put out when the firefighters are called.
When using the Fire Pit, Sims can no longer roast and eat horse fertilizer.
Sims can now ask other Sims out on dates!
Players can now adjust a Sim’s muscle definition and breast size.
Male Sims can now wear up to three earrings on one ear.
Fixed a very slow memory leak triggered by the "Fertilize" interaction.
Families are now able to go to work when owning multiple cars.
Hair no longer separates from Sims' head when werewolf teens turn into adults.
Sims will no longer die as easily by being struck by lightning.
Children can now drink served juice.
Primp interaction is no longer missing from the game.
"SuperTower", "Hey Hey It's the Monkey Bars" and "SlidenFraude" (from Go Play!) can now be repossessed by the Repo man.
Fix for babysitter routing off lots with babies.
Child Sims no longer deform after "Watching a Concert."
[PC ONLY] Addressed an issue where a user was unable to uninstall The Sims™ 3 if the 1.3 update was interrupted.
A faint line is no longer visible on the heads of babies.
Sims living together will now automatically know each other from the start.
“Jog Here” Interaction will not appear when selecting a pool.
Child and Teen Sims will not autonomously sit down in the street to do homework.
The "Veggies…Now" Adventure now specifically requires lettuce for completion.
Sims may now walk and stand on bridges
Body hair can now be applied on male Sims, from head to toe!
The wish to “Attend Prom” will no longer appear while a Sim is attending Prom.
Zombies will no longer continue to spawn after a Full Moon ends when the game has been saved during a Full Moon.
The Murphy Bed has been made less lethal.
Sims without dogs will no longer receive the “Your Dog wants to go to the park” wish.
Fixed an issue that caused Sims to leave their Toddler inside a bar at closing time.
[MAC ONLY] After exiting the game, desktop icons appear in same location as at game start.
Roofing is now visible on low end Intel video cards.
Children will no longer pop when drinking Hot Chocolate.
Sims performing the "Join Freestyle" interaction should no longer pop.
Sims will no longer pop while fishing.
Child Sims will no longer pop when asked to "Clean Up" the juice tray.
Ghost Sims will now remain floating when returning from Boarding School.
Service NPCs that have died will now be replaced correctly.
Popular Sims' facial animations no longer ceases to play when talking to other Sims.
[UNDOCUMENTED] Causes a severe bug with the Create a World tool which makes the tool unuseable.
Life Time Want "Reached Golden Anniversary" is now achievable.
Fixed an unlikely error that could occur if the player's Sim was far from home when a foreign visitor arrived.
Fences no longer occlude sound.
RT @TheStrangeLog: Sims will no longer have Grand Vampire's hairstyle after being bitten by the Grand Vampire.
Child Sims will no longer “Play in Sand” indoors where there is no sand.
There are now stricter relationship requirements for Woohooing with Sims in the Sarcophagus.
Flaming Bags of Poo should not be delivered indefinitely after a bad date.
Owned businesses now properly generate income again.
Influencing Sims to fight another Sim will no longer cause non-werewolf Sims to turn into a werewolf.
Improvements were made to car preference.
Stairs can be above and below each other.
Swimming Sims no longer walk on water after The Sims™ 3 is updated.
Sims can no longer travel with Sims who are in jail.
Social Groups now generate significantly less NPCs
The Heckle interaction is no longer available in Sims swimming in the ocean.
"Become Enemies with Child" wish no longer appears.
Sims can no longer "Try for Baby" with the Grim Reaper.
Closet WooHoo animation will now fail properly if one partner is occupied with another activity such as reading a book
Puppies and Kittens can no longer be taken to work.
The Sims 3 now supports more than 2000 concurrent save games.
Sims will no longer occasionally fail to walk a path involving four or more flights of stairs.
The Mad Scientist career track will no longer have a conflicting message about missing a day of work and having the day off.
Vampires do not keep vampire abilities after Nightlife is uninstalled
Fish no longer appear on dry ground of lots that have been coverted to residential lots .
Fixed a crash in Build Mode by preventing the game from thinking fences were rooms.
A Sim whose fiance dies can now become engaged again.
RT @Kotaku_UK: Proud Sims 4 parents put on a brave face as they spawn horrendous demon-babies http://t.co/9o2Teothp1 http://t.co/udo0bigmJm
Magical gnomes from Ambitions will now behavior appropriately.
You can now exit Build Mode when not on your home lot if a baby was incorrectly left in the home lot inventory.
Placing "Myne Door" dorm doors diagonally no longer causes entire rooms to turn invisible.
The wish to “Skinny Dip with Simbot” will no longer occur.
The Food Truck will now always stay at a location for at least a reasonable amount of time before leaving for the next location.
Patched an issue where the headmaster could get stuck indefinitely in a hot tub under certain motive conditions.
Housekeeper now fills holes and fixes broken objects.
Sim Babies no longer cry excessively.
[UNDOCUMENTED] Magicians re-enabled.
Bigfoot can no longer change appearance on the vanity table.
Sheet music can no longer be chosen from the bookshelf. This prevents a situation in which Sims could no longer learn particular songs.
"Befriend All Co-workers" wish is no longer fulfilled by switching to a job with no coworkers.
Kleptomaniac Sims are no longer able to steal the holes created by the Miner invention.
Sims no longer have the rare chance of getting permanently stuck while socializing.
Fixed an issue where pointed-ear dogs would become corrupt when moved into a lot.
The Sims 3 is now properly categorized as a game in the Windows Vista Games Explorer.
Pregnant Sims can no longer “Brawl.”
Sim now cannot move mailboxes when cutting gems or mounting fish.
Fixes an issue where Sims would be unintentionally removed from Boarding School when the Prom of another Sim began.
Sims can no longer perform mean socials to children.
Parents will no longer wish to "See Sim Get Married" for their already married children.
Woo Woo Fire Engines will now maintain all functionality after Sims drive them in Egypt, China, or France.
Teens sent to University can now successfully complete their first Semester.
The Old Prude will now appear on all the lots.
